\nPress Esc twice to exit, or use Ctrl+C: Press Esc twice to exit, or use Ctrl+C.
Set verbosity level (-v/-vvvv); repeat s: Set verbosity level (-v/-vvvv); repeat same level to disable
Invalid value for --min-savings. Provide: Invalid value for --min-savings. Provide a number between {min} and {max}.
Toggle flags by entering their short for: Toggle flags by entering their short forms together (e.g. -vx) or separately (e.g. -t). Re-enter a flag to disable it.
Enter a directory path (optionally add f: Enter a directory path (optionally add flags like '-vx'), or use [S]tart to proceed and [F]lag help for tips.
\nInteractive launch detected. Configure: Interactive launch detected. Configure your run before starting.
Trash-Compactor applies Windows NTFS com:
Trash-Compactor applies Windows NTFS compression with guardrails that avoid
low-yield cache folders. Run without arguments to launch the interactive 
window, or supply flags if you want to automate your run.
Target directory to compress. Omit to st: Target directory to compress. Omit to start the interactive walkthrough.
Disable LZX compression for better perfo: Disable LZX compression for better performance on low-end CPUs
Force LZX compression even if the CPU is: Force LZX compression even if the CPU is deemed less capable for peak compression
Throttle compression to a single worker: Throttle compression to a single worker to reduce disk fragmentation
Analyse directory entropy without compre: Analyse directory entropy without compressing files
Skip directories when estimated savings: Skip directories when estimated savings fall below this percentage (0-90, default {default:.0f})
Branding mode. Runs compact.exe for Wind: Branding mode. Runs compact.exe for Windows to mark files as compressed, if some files are reported as not
Thorough mode. Performs slower but has m: Thorough mode. Performs slower but has more accurate compression state checks for scheduled runs
Dry run: analyse entropy without compres: Dry run: analyse entropy without compressing files.
Branding mode: ensure Windows records co: Branding mode: ensure Windows records compressed attributes after the initial pass.
Thorough mode: perform deeper compressio: Thorough mode: perform deeper compression status checks suited for scheduled runs.
Single-worker mode: queue batches sequen: Single-worker mode: queue batches sequentially to minimise disk head contention.
Warning: {count} files are still not pro: Warning: {count} files are still not properly marked as compressed.
These files may be repeatedly processed: These files may be repeatedly processed in future runs.
Error: Cannot disable and force LZX comp: Error: Cannot disable and force LZX compression at the same time.
Error: Cannot combine dry-run mode with: Error: Cannot combine dry-run mode with branding.
Verbosity level 1: cache decisions and s: Verbosity level 1: cache decisions and summary stats
Verbosity level 2: include stage-level p: Verbosity level 2: include stage-level progress and verification warnings
Verbosity level 3: extended diagnostics: Verbosity level 3: extended diagnostics for skipped files
Verbosity level 4: full debug logging en: Verbosity level 4: full debug logging enabled
To compress Windows system files, use 'c: To compress Windows system files, use 'compact.exe /compactos:always' instead
-x: LZX compression disabled via command: -x: LZX compression disabled via command line flag.
Forcing LZX compression despite CPU havi: Forcing LZX compression despite CPU having only {physical} cores and {logical} threads
Using LZX compression (CPU deemed capabl: Using LZX compression (CPU deemed capable - it has {physical} cores and {logical} threads)
\nNotice: Your CPU has {physical} cores: Notice: Your CPU has {physical} cores and {logical} threads.
LZX compression requires at least {min_p: LZX compression requires at least {min_physical} cores and {min_logical} threads.
LZX compression has been disabled for be: LZX compression has been disabled for better system responsiveness.
Use -f flag to force LZX if you're feeli: Use -f flag to force LZX if you're feeling adventurous.
Unable to resolve the target volume. Ple: Unable to resolve the target volume. Please verify the path.
Network shares are not supported targets: Network shares are not supported targets for compression.
Please select a local NTFS volume instea: Please select a local NTFS volume instead.
Detected a traditional spinning hard dri: Detected a traditional spinning hard drive for this path.
Sustained compression can thrash the dis: Sustained compression can thrash the disk heads, fragment files, and slow app/game launches.
• Run the task during idle hours and use: • Run the task during idle hours and use the single-worker mode (-s)
• Defragment the drive once compression: • Defragment the drive once compression finishes
• Prefer compressing rarely modified fol: • Prefer compressing rarely modified folders on HDDs
\nDo you want to proceed anyway? (y/n):: Do you want to proceed anyway? (y/n):
\nThrottle compression to a single worke: Throttle compression to a single worker to avoid disk fragmentation? (Y/n):
Running sequentially to keep fragmentati: Running sequentially to keep fragmentation in check.
\nProceeding with compression on HDD. Th: Proceeding with compression on HDD. This may impact system performance.
No directories exceeded the reporting th: No directories exceeded the reporting threshold of %.1f MB.
Reporting directories with total size >=: Reporting directories with total size >= %.1f MB.
\nThis directory may have already been c: This directory may have already been compressed.
Starting entropy dry run for directory:: Starting entropy dry run for directory: %s
\nEntropy analysis complete: {sampled} d: Entropy analysis complete: {sampled} directories sampled, {below} below threshold.
Skipped %s directories due to low expect: Skipped %s directories due to low expected savings (<%.1f%%):
\n{skipped} out of {total} files are poo: {skipped} out of {total} files are poorly compressible
\nEntropy analysis skipped: base directo: Entropy analysis skipped: base directory excluded.
\nEntropy analysis skipped: no compressi: Entropy analysis skipped: no compressible files detected.
Using thorough checking mode - this will: Using thorough checking mode - this will be slower but more accurate for previously compressed files
Dry run aborted: base directory %s is ex: Dry run aborted: base directory %s is excluded (%s)
